verses.verse: וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> came בְּאַחַ֤ת <WH259> [month] in the first עֶשְׂרֵה֙ <WH6240> ten שָׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> year בַּשְּׁלִישִׁ֖י <WH7992> in the third בְּאֶחָ֣ד <WH259> the first לַחֹ֑דֶשׁ <WH2320> [day] of the month הָיָ֥ה <WH1961> came דְבַר־ <WH1697> [that] the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <WH413> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> came unto me saying

בֶּן־ <WH1121> Son אָדָ֕ם <WH120> of man אֱמֹ֛ר <WH559> speak אֶל־ <WH413> to פַּרְעֹ֥ה <WH6547> unto Pharaoh מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king מִצְרַ֖יִם <WH4714> of Egypt וְאֶל־ <WH413> and to הֲמוֹנ֑וֹ <WH1995> and to his multitude אֶל־ <WH413> about מִ֖י <WH4310> are you דָּמִ֥יתָ <WH1819> Whom art thou like בְגָדְלֶֽךָ׃ <WH1433> greatness

הִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> Behold אַשּׁ֜וּר <WH804> Behold the Assyrian אֶ֣רֶז <WH730> [was] a cedar בַּלְּבָנ֗וֹן <WH3844> in Lebanon יְפֵ֥ה <WH3303> with fair עָנָ֛ף <WH6057> branches וְחֹ֥רֶשׁ <WH2793> shroud מֵצַ֖ל <WH6751> and with a shadowing וּגְבַ֣הּ <WH1362> and of an high קוֹמָ֑ה <WH6967> stature וּבֵ֣ין <WH996> was among עֲבֹתִ֔ים <WH5688> was among the thick boughs הָיְתָ֖ה <WH1961> become צַמַּרְתּֽוֹ׃ <WH6788> and his top

מַ֣יִם <WH4325> The waters גִּדְּל֔וּהוּ <WH1431> made him great תְּה֖וֹם <WH8415> the deep רֹֽמְמָ֑תְהוּ <WH7311> set him up on high אֶת־ <WH854> for נַהֲרֹתֶ֗יהָ <WH5104> with her rivers הֹלֵךְ֙ <WH1980> running סְבִיב֣וֹת <WH5439> round about מַטָּעָ֔הּ <WH4302> his plants וְאֶת־ <WH853> תְּעָלֹתֶ֣יהָ <WH8585> her little rivers שִׁלְחָ֔ה <WH7971> and sent out אֶ֖ל <WH413> to כָּל־ <WH3605> all עֲצֵ֥י <WH6086> unto all the trees הַשָּׂדֶֽה׃ <WH7704> of the field

עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּן֙ <WH3651> after that גָּבְהָ֣א <WH1361> was exalted קֹמָת֔וֹ <WH6967> Therefore his height מִכֹּ֖ל <WH3605> all עֲצֵ֣י <WH6086> above all the trees הַשָּׂדֶ֑ה <WH7704> of the field וַתִּרְבֶּ֨ינָה <WH7235> were multiplied סַֽרְעַפֹּתָ֜יו <WH5634> and his boughs וַתֶּאֱרַ֧כְנָה <WH748> became long [פֹארֹתֹו כ] (פֹארֹתָ֛יו <WH6288> bough ק) מִמַּ֥יִם <WH4325> of waters רַבִּ֖ים <WH7227> because of the multitude בְּשַׁלְּחֽוֹ׃ <WH7971> when he shot forth

בִּסְעַפֹּתָ֤יו <WH5589> in his boughs קִֽנְנוּ֙ <WH7077> made their nests כָּל־ <WH3605> All ע֣וֹף <WH5775> All the fowls הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <WH8064> of heaven וְתַ֤חַת <WH8478> and under פֹּֽארֹתָיו֙ <WH6288> and under his branches יָֽלְד֔וּ <WH3205> bring forth their young כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> all חַיַּ֣ת <WH2416> did all the beasts הַשָּׂדֶ֑ה <WH7704> of the field וּבְצִלּוֹ֙ <WH6738> and under his shadow יֵֽשְׁב֔וּ <WH3427> dwelt כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> and all גּוֹיִ֥ם <WH1471> nations רַבִּֽים׃ <WH7227> all great

וַיְּיִ֣ף <WH3302> Thus was he fair בְּגָדְל֔וֹ <WH1433> in his greatness בְּאֹ֖רֶךְ <WH753> in the length דָּֽלִיּוֹתָ֑יו <WH1808> of his branches כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for הָיָ֥ה <WH1961> extended שָׁרְשׁ֖וֹ <WH8328> for his root אֶל־ <WH413> about מַ֥יִם <WH4325> waters רַבִּֽים׃ <WH7227> was by great

אֲרָזִ֣ים <WH730> The cedars לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not עֲמָמֻהוּ֮ <WH6004> could not hide בְּגַן־ <WH1588> in the garden אֱלֹהִים֒ <WH430> of God בְּרוֹשִׁ֗ים <WH1265> him the fir trees לֹ֤א <WH3808> not דָמוּ֙ <WH1819> were not like אֶל־ <WH413> with סְעַפֹּתָ֔יו <WH5589> his boughs וְעַרְמֹנִ֥ים <WH6196> and the chesnut trees לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not הָי֖וּ <WH1961> become כְּפֹֽארֹתָ֑יו <WH6288> were not like his branches כָּל־ <WH3605> all manner עֵץ֙ <WH6086> nor any tree בְּגַן־ <WH1588> in the garden אֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> of God לֹא־ <WH3808> could דָמָ֥ה <WH1819> was like אֵלָ֖יו <WH413> in בְּיָפְיֽוֹ׃ <WH3308> unto him in his beauty

יָפֶ֣ה <WH3303> him fair עֲשִׂיתִ֔יו <WH6213> I have made בְּרֹ֖ב <WH7230> by the multitude דָּֽלִיּוֹתָ֑יו <WH1808> of his branches וַיְקַנְאֻ֙הוּ֙ <WH7065> envied כָּל־ <WH3605> and all עֲצֵי־ <WH6086> so that all the trees עֵ֔דֶן <WH5731> of Eden אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which בְּגַ֥ן <WH1588> that [were] in the garden הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> of God ס

לָכֵ֗ן <WH3651> Therefore כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> Therefore thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3069> GOD יַ֕עַן <WH3282> because אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> it גָּבַ֖הְתָּ <WH1361> Because thou hast lifted up בְּקוֹמָ֑ה <WH6967> thyself in height וַיִּתֵּ֤ן <WH5414> and he hath shot up צַמַּרְתּוֹ֙ <WH6788> his top אֶל־ <WH413> about בֵּ֣ין <WH996> among עֲבוֹתִ֔ים <WH5688> among the thick boughs וְרָ֥ם <WH7311> is lifted up לְבָב֖וֹ <WH3824> and his heart בְּגָבְהֽוֹ׃ <WH1363> in his height

וְאֶ֨תְּנֵ֔הוּ <WH5414> I have therefore delivered בְּיַ֖ד <WH3027> him into the hand אֵ֣יל <WH410> of the mighty one גּוֹיִ֑ם <WH1471> of the heathen עָשׂ֤וֹ <WH6213> he shall surely יַֽעֲשֶׂה֙ <WH6213> deal ל֔וֹ כְּרִשְׁע֖וֹ <WH7562> for his wickedness גֵּרַשְׁתִּֽהוּ׃ <WH1644> with him I have driven him out

וַיִּכְרְתֻ֧הוּ <WH3772> have cut him off זָרִ֛ים <WH2114> And strangers עָרִיצֵ֥י <WH6184> the terrible גוֹיִ֖ם <WH1471> of the nations וַֽיִּטְּשֻׁ֑הוּ <WH5203> and have left אֶל־ <WH413> on הֶ֠הָרִים <WH2022> him upon the mountains וּבְכָל־ <WH3605> all גֵּ֨אָי֜וֹת <WH1516> and in all the valleys נָפְל֣וּ <WH5307> are fallen דָלִיּוֹתָ֗יו <WH1808> his branches וַתִּשָּׁבַ֤רְנָה <WH7665> are broken פֹֽארֹתָיו֙ <WH6288> and his boughs בְּכֹל֙ <WH3605> all אֲפִיקֵ֣י <WH650> by all the rivers הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> of the land וַיֵּרְד֧וּ <WH3381> are gone down מִצִּלּ֛וֹ <WH6738> from his shadow כָּל־ <WH3605> and all עַמֵּ֥י <WH5971> and all the people הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> of the earth וַֽיִּטְּשֻֽׁהוּ׃ <WH5203> and have left

עַל־ <WH5921> on מַפַּלְתּ֥וֹ <WH4658> Upon his ruin יִשְׁכְּנ֖וּ <WH7931> remain כָּל־ <WH3605> all ע֣וֹף <WH5775> shall all the fowls הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <WH8064> of the heaven וְאֶל־ <WH413> will be on פֹּארֹתָ֣יו <WH6288> shall be upon his branches הָי֔וּ <WH1961> become כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> and all חַיַּ֥ת <WH2416> and all the beasts הַשָּׂדֶֽה׃ <WH7704> of the field

לְמַ֡עַן <WH4616> so אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> after לֹא־ <WH3808> nor יִגְבְּה֨וּ <WH1361> exalt בְקוֹמָתָ֜ם <WH6967> themselves for their height כָּל־ <WH3605> all עֲצֵי־ <WH6086> To the end that none of all the trees מַ֗יִם <WH4325> by the waters וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor יִתְּנ֤וּ <WH5414> neither shoot up אֶת־ <WH853> צַמַּרְתָּם֙ <WH6788> their top אֶל־ <WH413> about בֵּ֣ין <WH996> among עֲבֹתִ֔ים <WH5688> among the thick boughs וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor יַעַמְד֧וּ <WH5975> stand up אֵלֵיהֶ֛ם <WH352> neither their trees בְּגָבְהָ֖ם <WH1363> in their height כָּל־ <WH3605> have all שֹׁ֣תֵי <WH8354> all that drink מָ֑יִם <WH4325> water כִּֽי־ <WH3588> that כֻלָּם֩ <WH3605> all נִתְּנ֨וּ <WH5414> for they are all delivered לַמָּ֜וֶת <WH4194> unto death אֶל־ <WH413> to אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> of the earth תַּחְתִּ֗ית <WH8482> to the nether parts בְּת֛וֹךְ <WH8432> in the midst בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> of the children אָדָ֖ם <WH120> of men אֶל־ <WH413> with י֥וֹרְדֵי <WH3381> with them that go down בֽוֹר׃ <WH953> to the pit ס

כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֞ר <WH559> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֗ה <WH3068> GOD בְּי֨וֹם <WH3117> In the day רִדְתּ֤וֹ <WH3381> when he went down שְׁא֙וֹלָה֙ <WH7585> to the grave הֶאֱבַ֜לְתִּי <WH56> I caused a mourning כִּסֵּ֤תִי <WH3680> I covered עָלָיו֙ <WH5921> over אֶת־ <WH853> תְּה֔וֹם <WH8415> the deep וָֽאֶמְנַע֙ <WH4513> for him and I restrained נַהֲרוֹתֶ֔יהָ <WH5104> the floods וַיִּכָּלְא֖וּ <WH3607> were stayed מַ֣יִם <WH4325> waters רַבִּ֑ים <WH7227> thereof and the great וָאַקְדִּ֤ר <WH6937> to mourn עָלָיו֙ <WH5921> account לְבָנ֔וֹן <WH3844> and I caused Lebanon וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all עֲצֵ֥י <WH6086> for him and all the trees הַשָּׂדֶ֖ה <WH7704> of the field עָלָ֥יו <WH5921> over עֻלְפֶּֽה׃ <WH5969> fainted

מִקּ֤וֹל <WH6963> at the sound מַפַּלְתּוֹ֙ <WH4658> of his fall הִרְעַ֣שְׁתִּי <WH7493> to shake גוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> I made the nations בְּהוֹרִדִ֥י <WH3381> when I cast him down אֹת֛וֹ <WH853> שְׁא֖וֹלָה <WH7585> to hell אֶת־ <WH854> for י֣וֹרְדֵי <WH3381> with them that descend ב֑וֹר <WH953> into the pit וַיִּנָּ֨חֲמ֜וּ <WH5162> shall be comforted בְּאֶ֤רֶץ <WH776> of the earth תַּחְתִּית֙ <WH8482> in the nether parts כָּל־ <WH3605> and all עֲצֵי־ <WH6086> and all the trees עֵ֔דֶן <WH5731> of Eden מִבְחַ֥ר <WH4005> the choice וְטוֹב־ <WH2896> and best לְבָנ֖וֹן <WH3844> of Lebanon כָּל־ <WH3605> and all שֹׁ֥תֵי <WH8354> all that drink מָֽיִם׃ <WH4325> water

גַּם־ <WH1571> also הֵ֗ם <WH1992> like אִתּ֛וֹ <WH854> for יָרְד֥וּ <WH3381> They also went down שְׁא֖וֹלָה <WH7585> into hell אֶל־ <WH413> to חַלְלֵי־ <WH2491> with him unto [them that be] slain חָ֑רֶב <WH2719> with the sword וּזְרֹע֛וֹ <WH2220> and [they that were] his arm יָשְׁב֥וּ <WH3427> [that] dwelt בְצִלּ֖וֹ <WH6738> under his shadow בְּת֥וֹךְ <WH8432> in the midst גּוֹיִֽם׃ <WH1471> of the heathen

אֶל־ <WH413> to מִ֨י <WH4310> which דָמִ֥יתָ <WH1819> To whom art thou thus like כָּ֛כָה <WH3602> thus בְּכָב֥וֹד <WH3519> in glory וּבְגֹ֖דֶל <WH1433> and in greatness בַּעֲצֵי־ <WH6086> among the trees עֵ֑דֶן <WH5731> of Eden וְהוּרַדְתָּ֨ <WH3381> down אֶת־ <WH854> with עֲצֵי־ <WH6086> with the trees עֵ֜דֶן <WH5731> of Eden אֶל־ <WH413> to אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> of the earth תַּחְתִּ֗ית <WH8482> unto the nether parts בְּת֨וֹךְ <WH8432> in the midst עֲרֵלִ֤ים <WH6189> of the uncircumcised תִּשְׁכַּב֙ <WH7901> thou shalt lie אֶת־ <WH854> for חַלְלֵי־ <WH2491> with [them that be] slain חֶ֔רֶב <WH2719> by the sword ה֤וּא <WH1931> he פַרְעֹה֙ <WH6547> This [is] Pharaoh וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all הֲמוֹנֹ֔ה <WH1995> and all his multitude נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <WH3069> GOD ס
